## RemirrorGetterParams.getText() method

Get the current raw text from the latest editor state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getText(lineBreakDivider?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lineBreakDivider | <code>string</code> | the divider to use for new lines defaults to '<!-- -->\\<!-- -->n<!-- -->\\<!-- -->n' |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
